Texts.string: Hunk was very lonely.\nOne day, as he was sitting alone in his castle,\nhe decided he needed a friend.
Someone to hang out with and cuddle.
And then, when he heard that Prince Nice Cube was about to marry Princess Candice...
He decided to kidnap the Prince.
Because he looked squishy. And cute.
So, on the wedding day he carried out his evil plan.
Oh no! My prince is gone! Give him back!
I won't let you get away like this.\nI am going to catch you and get my groom back!
